00084 //===========================================================
00085 template <typename T,size_t sz>
00086 RingBuffer<T,sz>::RingBuffer()
00087 {
00088         m_Mutex = core::EngineCore::createMutex();
00089         m_NotFull = core::EngineCore::createCondition();
00090         m_NotEmpty = core::EngineCore::createCondition();
00091         m_Count = m_Front = m_Rear = 0;
00092         //std::cout << "Created a boundede buffer of size: " << sz << " " << (void*)this << " " << (void*)m_Mutex <<std::endl;
00093 }
00094 
00095 //===========================================================
00096 template <typename T,size_t sz>
00097 RingBuffer<T,sz>::~RingBuffer()
00098 {
00099         core::EngineCore::destroyMutex(m_Mutex);
00100         core::EngineCore::destroyCondition(m_NotFull);
00101         core::EngineCore::destroyCondition(m_NotEmpty);
00102 }
00103 
00104 //==========================================================
00105 template <typename T, size_t sz>
00106 T               RingBuffer<T,sz>::fetch()
00107 {
00108         //std::cout << "fetch a boundede buffer of size: " << sz << " " << (void*)this << " " << (void*)m_Mutex <<std::endl;
00109         m_Mutex->lock();
00110         while(m_Count == 0)
00111         {
00112                 m_NotEmpty->wait(m_Mutex);
00113         }
00114         size_t tmp = m_Front;
00115         m_Front = (++m_Front) % sz;
00116         --m_Count;
00117         m_Mutex->unlock();
00118         m_NotFull->signal();
00119         return m_Buffer[tmp]; //To activate RVO
00120 
00121 }
00122 
00123 //==========================================================
00124 template <typename T, size_t sz>
00125 void    RingBuffer<T,sz>::deposit(const T& val)
00126 {
00127         m_Mutex->lock();
00128         while(m_Count == sz)
00129         {
00130                 m_NotFull->wait(m_Mutex);
00131         }
00132         m_Buffer[m_Rear] = val;
00133         m_Rear = (++m_Rear) % sz;
00134         ++m_Count;
00135         m_Mutex->unlock();
00136         m_NotEmpty->signal();
00137 }

00139 //==========================================================
00140 template <typename T, size_t sz>
00141 bool    RingBuffer<T,sz>::empty()
00142 {
00143         return (m_Count == 0);
00144 }
00145 
00146 //==========================================================
00147 template <typename T, size_t sz>
00148 bool    RingBuffer<T,sz>::full()
00149 {
00150         return (m_Count == sz);
00151 }
00152 
00153 //==========================================================
00154 template <typename T, size_t sz>
00155 size_t  RingBuffer<T,sz>::count()
00156 {
00157         return m_Count;
00158 }
